v8:item.v8:content: Hello! I am your Counterparty information filling wizard.
Your company is a legal entity
Specify the basic information about your legal entity
Fill in the short name of your company (e.g. Our company). This name will be displayed in all the configuration lists:
Fill in the full name of your company (e.g. - Our company LLC). This name will be displayed in the document print forms:
Fill in the full name of your company used in tax remission documents (e.g. Our company LLC). This name will be displayed in the print documents forms of the taxes listing:
Specify the basic information about the sole proprietor
Fill in the proprietor's full name:
Fill in the short name of individual entrepreneur (e.g. - Ivanov). This name will be displayed in all the configuration lists:
Fill in the full name of individual entrepreneur (e.g. Ivanov I.I. sole proprietor). This name will be displayed in the document print forms:

Fill in the full name of individual entrepreneur used in tax remission documents (e.g. Ivanov I.I. individual entrepreneur). This name will be displayed in the print documents forms of the taxes listing:
Fill main codes. Data is required for the correct documents print forms filling
Fill in the surmane, name and patronymic of the main people in charge. This information will be automatically reflected in the print form of the documents.
Well done! Information about the company was filled successfully!
In the future you can fine-tune the accounting parameters from the "Enterprise" - "Settings" section (in the navigation panel).
Click "Next" to go to the next step
